data.title: Best Desserts around!
data.text: If you have a sweet tooth - this is definitely the place to go - their cakes are to die for and the cupcakes are devine.

data.title: very good food, especially the special order cakes
data.text: This is really the only high quality bakery, in my opinion, in Sioux City. They offer a wide variety and do a lot of special orders. Our office uses them for cakes to celebrate employee's who have milestone anniversaries with our company. Always great.

data.title: Very. Good baked goods
data.text: I have had them make several cakes etc and am very pleased with the food service and prices.  Highly recommend for your bakery needs.

data.title: birthday surprise
data.text:
A work friend surprised me with a cookie bouquet from the Sugar Shack. The bouquet had 5 flower cookies and a square that said "Happy Birthday." The frosting on the flowers was brightly colored in hot pink, turquoise, purple, and yellow. The vase kept the basket upright with no danger of tipping. 
The cookies were individually wrapped which was a nice touch. They stayed fresh for over a week. 
Trip Advisor rankings do not really work for Sugar Shack. This is a place where you order something and go get it. It is not a restaurant.

data.title: Terrific treats
data.text: This is the best place to get cakes for special occasions.  Also delicious cookies if you want to make someone's day.

data.title: Great asset for sioux city
data.text: We have gotten several cakes from sugar shack the latest being my husbands birthday cake. The staff do an excellent job with decorating. There are never any leftovers!

data.title: Best Groupon I've bought!
data.text:
When using a groupon I have found that I either get a great deal by a business that wants me to come back, or half the service since I paid for only half.  This Sugar Shack was the best groupon I ever got.
I got the small cookie and bar platter-WOW this is not small!! There were over 20 items on the tray, and there was a variety of cookies and bars making this a success for dessert. 
The cookies were great, the red velvet and chocolate nut ones were gone in an instant.  Everything was fresh~will definitely come back!
